(Cerberus isn't near the base, as Dachande isn't)

Magmatron:

     "Welcome back friends," Magmatron said from his darkened command 
chair. They could only see his green eyes. "Computer, lights."
     The lights came on and Magmatron rose in his new impressive 
robot mode. "This war will be quick and deadly, we will take no 
prisioners, I want to get back to my galaxy as soon as I can. It was 
so much more fun there, clowns and things like that."
     Magmatron punched a few keys and brought up a map of every base 
on the planet, as of when he had left. Then a red line passed over 
the screen and the map updated. "Which one is weakest?"
